channel.title: Autonomous Data Guard on MuShop
channel.description: Recent content in Autonomous Data Guard on MuShop

item.title: Setup
item.description: Introduction In this section we detail the steps required to perform a DR solution between us-phoenix-1 and us-ashburn-1 regions. These regions are used as an example, you can choose the regions of your choice. Set Environment Variables export COMPARTMENT_ID=<COMPARTMENT_ID> export DB_NAME=demoadb export DB_DISPLAY_NAME=demoadb export DB_PASSWORD=<DB_PASSWORD> export WALLET_PW=<DB_WALLET_PASSWORD> export DB_SERVICE_NAME=${DB_NAME}_tp export WALLET_ZIP=/tmp/Wallet_${DB_NAME}.zip export PRIMARY_REGION=us-phoenix-1 export FAILOVER_REGION=us-ashburn-1 Do refer the autonomous database password criteria’s here Setup ADB (Autonomous Database) Create the Source ADB (Autonomous Database)
